mapper.select: select c.id as id, c.name as name, count(p.id) count, c.description description from post p right join category c on p.category_id = c.id where c.blog_id = #{uesr_id} group by c.id order by c.id desc
mapper.insert: insert into category (id, name, description, blog_id) values (null,#{name},#{description},#{blogId});
